title: Darius has more range, more health, more AD, and more defenses than Poppy
body:
How is a fighter allowed to be tankier than a tank, with longer range of engagement and more damage, all while only having to build a single item to invalidate anything his opponent can buy?

Buying any armor just makes his {{item:3071}} more gold efficient while throwing away gold of your own, meaning he'll outtrade you until he can ult you from 1/3 health.

You can't buy damage to outdamage him because even at 350 AD, he still deals more at just 290.

Remove total AD scaling from the game on everything but actual basic attack modifiers. If you want to scale with AD you should actually have to buy AD. It's bad enough this cancer character has one of the highest banrates in the game from his obnoxious gameplay, it's all the worse when there is no counterplay outside of "hope you don't have to first pick top so you can pick a ranged character against him."


Every time I lane against this fucker all I can think is
"Man it sure would be great if my Q healed me"
"Man it sure would be great if I could rip an opponent under my turret/out of theirs from beyond their attack range"
"Man it sure would be great if my Ult just deleted people instead of sending them twenty feet back while tickling their nads"
"Man it sure would be great if I could build a single item that has no counterbuild."

Darius's "tankiness" is mainly derived from him being able to hit someone with a Q, as unlike other tanks, he doesn't have any innate durability & is item-dependable for mobility. He's also not a very strong front-liner, as he is very prone to being constantly CC'ed & has no way of getting out of the fight. Worst of all, if a Darius is behind on kills, he's less noticeable in teamfights since the only thing he can provide is a pull & damage.

Poppy on the other hand has natural tankiness from her W, as has multiple ways to cripple the enemies' mobility, such as the slow from her Q, stopping possible dashes from her W &, stunning/catching out enemies with her E & her ult as an engage/giant disengager. She mostly depends on %hp damage from her Q & possible Sunfire build, and yes, unlike Darius's Juggernaut strength, she doesn't provide a lot of damage, but is an excellent tank champ in terms of team utility.

I want to remind you that Darius is not technically a "Tank". He's a Juggernaut, like Illaoi & Yorick. He's meant to deal damage & possibly being sturdy in teamfights if he hits his abilities, while he trades by not having much CC & durability. Poppy is considered an actual Tank, similar to Sion or Maokai, where she deals a significant tons of CC & durability, while having to trade out her damage for it.

Trinity is best if you are jg. The problems with trinity is how you will usually be against a tank at top lane. It is also expensive while not giving as much stats (450 compared to around 200 or 250 hp). Trinity also does not give you wave clear which is usually needed if you are going to play top lane. Titanic helps to take towers faster and it also helps get picks (the ms), but the wave clear, hp, and hp regen out ways the pick potential trinity give (if you actually get the aa reset, trinity and titanic will do about the same dmg, titanic actually might do a little more due to it scaling off hp).  You can go for both of the items in your build, but that's usually when you are super fed.
